hero.title: Share your ride, save money
hero.subtitle: Connect with people going to the same destination

step1.title: 1. Search or Publish
step1.description: Search available trips or publish yours. Completely free, no hidden costs.

step2.title: 2. Connect
step2.description: Contact other users directly. No intermediaries or commissions.

step3.title: 3. Share and Save
step3.description: Split travel costs among passengers. Save money and help the environment.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: We don't charge commissions. Not to the driver nor the passenger. What you agree is what you pay.

safe.title: Safe and Reliable
safe.description: Rating system and user verification for your safety.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.description: Reduce your carbon footprint by sharing rides. Fewer cars, less pollution.

community.title: Community
community.description: Meet new people and make the journey more enjoyable by sharing experiences.
